function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Weaker health systems in low-and middle-income countries (LMIC)","Impact":"Increased difficulty in managing and treating contagious diseases, leading to higher infection rates and mortality","Mitigation":"Improving healthcare infrastructure, increasing medical resources, and providing better training for healthcare workers","Technologies":"Healthcare management systems, telemedicine, medical supply chain optimization","People":"Populations in low-and middle-income countries (LMIC)","Owner":"Government, international organizations, healthcare providers"},{"Description":"Socioeconomic conditions exacerbating consequences of the pandemic","Impact":"Increased social and health inequalities, leading to higher infection rates and mortality among vulnerable populations","Mitigation":"Increasing access to healthcare, providing financial support, and improving living conditions for vulnerable populations","Technologies":"Telehealth, digital financial services, urban planning for better living conditions","People":"Vulnerable populations such as Indigenous populations, homeless people, populations of lower socioeconomic status, migrants, and people in prison or detention","Owner":"Government, NGOs, community organizations"},{"Description":"High-risk environmental exposures and inaccessibility of accurate information and timely healthcare services","Impact":"Higher susceptibility to contagious diseases and difficulty in receiving timely healthcare, leading to higher infection rates and mortality","Mitigation":"Improving environmental health, providing accurate information, and increasing healthcare accessibility in vulnerable areas","Technologies":"Environmental monitoring systems, telecommunication technology, mobile healthcare units","People":"Populations with high-risk environmental exposures and limited healthcare accessibility","Owner":"Government, environmental agencies, healthcare providers"}]}
